oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gigantic Fireworks Display
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Carnivals; Wayne, John, 1907-1979; Saxon, John, 1935-
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and blue on white) Hatch poster announcing "Gigantic Fireworks Display" at Sunset Drive-in on Monday, May 30. theater shows "The Barbarian and the Geisha" starring John Wayne and "Rock Pretty Boy" starring John Saxon.
